videos.title: High-Velocity Bitcoin
videos.text: Onyx is now a high-velocity Bitcoin development environment. You can now use Onyx to write Bitcoin scripts and test them locally.

videos.title: Code by Voice
videos.text: Voice coding is now available in Onyx. You can write code by speaking to your phone, and Onyx will convert your speech to code in real-time.

videos.title: Neutrality Wins
videos.text: We're building Onyx to be a neutral platform for AI development. No politics, no censorship, just pure technological advancement.

videos.title: Onyx Beta Launch
videos.text: We launch Onyx v0.0.1, our first beta build for Android and iOS! This build includes a local version of Llama 3.2 1B that runs privately on your phone.
